title: Kate Ferdinand wears black bikini in Instagram photo
text:
She recently tied the knot with her partner Rio Ferdinand in a lavish ceremony in Turkey.

And Kate Ferdinand looked nothing short of sensational as she displayed her jaw-dropping figure in a sultry Instagram snap on Wednesday.

The former TOWIE star, 28, donned a black bikini top with matching bottoms and straps around her waist as she posed beside her new 40-year-old husband.

Things are going swimmingly: Newlyweds Rio and Kate Ferdinand shared shots of themselves at a pool party on Wednesday, almost three weeks after their lavish wedding in Turkey

Styling her platinum blonde locks into lustrous waves, Kate also donned a large straw hat and a pair of pink shades.

Showing off her sun-kissed glow, Kate posed on a balcony with a breathtaking view of the ocean behind her.

Completing her look with a pair of hoop earrings, the reality star, who is known for her dedication to fitness, captioned the snap: 'MRS FERDINAND.'

Rio also took to his own Instagram account to share images of the newlywed couple's sun-soaked adventures.

Beauty: Kate looked nothing short of sensational as she displayed her jawdropping figure in a sultry Instagram snap

Lip service: Sportsman Rio, 40, proudly shared shots of himself locking lips with his new wife

Kate recently treated her legions of social media followers to a glimpse at her wedding to the footballer.

Kate looked radiant on the big day in a risqué corseted gown before going for a wholly more pared-back look later in the night when she changed into a maxi skirt and crop top - making for an edgy choice for a bride as they lived it up with their nearest and dearest.

In one hilarious video, Rio is seen getting low - however he admitted he was struggling with the dance due to his age, as he penned: 'Should I really be doing this at my age?'

Dancing played quite the integral part of their big day, as the couple were rocking out to various types of music - including a saxophonist, a live band and eventually the R&B icon Ashanti.

Speech: The erstwhile Manchester United player also shared a shot of himself making a speech at the couple's lavish nuptials in Turkey

Happy days: Kate wore an exquisite gown with a corseted top as she held on to her beau Rio on their wedding day

Prior to the music bonanza, the wedding breakfast was held on a stunning beachfront location.

The tables were decorated with a poem detailing the couple's love story, with the words reading: 'As a thanks for celebrating our 'I do', we have a little tale for you. It all started back in the Dubai sun. A beach, burger and plenty of fun. Tate, Lorenz and Tia played a part, in helping their dad to follow his heart.'

Earlier in the week, Kate shared a snap depicting Rio's sons Lorenz, 13, and Tate, 11, who he shares alongside daughter Tia, eight, with late wife Rebecca Ellison, walking her down the aisle during their nuptials.

How many tiers? The couple cut into an incredible seven-tier cake adorned with roses

Happy days: The couple were engrossed in one another during their steamy first dance

She added a caption reading: 'There were so many special moments at our wedding ..... but this is one I will never forget #proud #myboys', shortly before Rio shared her post and admitted the moment 'warmed his heart'.

Kate and Rio became engaged in November following a romantic proposal in Dubai, where he popped the question in front of the three kids.

The newlyweds tied the knot in front of family, friends and former TOWIE stars Lydia and Debbie Bright at the end of last month.

Wow: Kate is known for her love of fitness and often treats her followers to her stunning bikini snaps

Speaking about the moment his boys walked Kate down the aisle, Rio told OK! Magazine: 'I cried as soon as the day started. Seeing Tia walk up the aisle before Kate set me off. It was just so emotional...

'There was just no going back on the emotion, that’s why I had to keep my shades on.

'Seeing Tate and Lorenz walk Kate down the aisle was particularly poignant and we wouldn’t have wanted to do it any other way... They were so proud and they couldn’t wait to do that, they felt important'.
description: The former TOWIE star, 28, donned a black bikini with matching straps around her waist in the snap.
